specific_rule_applied: Claims must be novel, non-obvious, and not anticipated by prior art
evidence_assessment: Experts disagree on whether this difference is unexpected or self-evident
decision_reasoning: Claims 2 and 3 of the '288 patent are invalid due to obviousness
The improvement in stability was deemed more-or-less self-evident given the state of the art
result_details: Apotex was entitled to costs reduced by 25% due to abandoned fraud allegations
